componentDescription: Provides interactive UI for binary user input

shape.description: Optional 'shape' prop to determine the shape of the toggle.

isToggled.description: Optional boolean indicating the current state of the toggle.

isDisabled.description: Optional boolean to specify if the toggle should be disabled.

children.description: Mandatory prop, representing the child elements of the toggle component.

variant.description: Optional prop to apply predefined style variants.

colorScheme.description: Optional string to customize the color theme of the toggle component.

onToggle.description: Optional function prop that gets executed when the toggle state changes.

[x: string].description: Index signature allowing any additional properties not explicitly defined.
